column4: i have a vm with virtualbox that I just installed ubuntu server on - i installed php2 and apache2 but when ever i try to go to the IP ifconfig returns it can't connect. why, and how should I go about fixing this?
gah, I can't stand webchat from freenode, afk while i get xchat running
there are different network modes for virtualbox guests. i think you didn't setup the guest right so that you can reach it from the host
you're missing  a good understanding of virtualbox' network modes... there's host-NAT, bridged or host-only networking. you'll probably want bridged
